snippet: The gunmen opened fire and threw explosive devices in the villages of Kolori and Ba’ana Imam.
abstract: Nigerian military reports 24 dead in attacks on two villages by gunmen on horseback; Islamist group Boko Haram has carried out similar raids, using guns and explosives, but no one has claimed responsibility for attacks near Biu, in country's northeast.
lead_paragraph: The gunmen opened fire and threw explosive devices in the villages of Kolori and Ba’ana Imam.

headline.main: Nigeria: Gunmen Kill at Least 24 People in 2 Villages
headline.print_headline: Africa; Nigeria: Gunmen Kill at Least 24 People in 2 Villages
